abstract: Lawyers in a class action suit against UnitedHealth Group say freshly unsealed documents show that the company’s current chief executive, Stephen Hemsley, was more involved in granting backdated options than previously thought, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers in a class action suit against UnitedHealth Group say freshly unsealed documents show that the company’s current chief executive, Stephen Hemsley, was more involved in granting backdated options than previously thought, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: UnitedHealth Chief May Have Stronger Ties to Backdating, Report Says
